doc:
Helen Bray https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Bray 0 Helen Bray (November 25, 1889 – October 15, 1990) was a Missouri-born American actress who appeared in several silent films during the early 20th century. Bray is the great-grandmother of actress Michelle Pierce, who appears now in the TV show NCIS. Helen_Bray ( November_25_,_1889 – October_15_,_1990 ) was a_Missouri-born_American_actress who appeared in several_silent_films during the_early_20th_century . Bray is the_great-grandmother of actress_Michelle_Pierce , who appears now in the_TV_show_NCIS .
